0: 0 ---> Minutos de plan no aplicados (if recurrent minutes failed to be applied in customer account (B2C))
1: Minutos de plan no aplicados (if recurrent minutes failed to be applied in customer account (B2C))
2: Minutos de plan no aplicados-ECN (if recurrent minutes failed to be applied (B2B))
3: Transferencia de contrato por cambio de numero (failed in transfering contract)
5: Balance desaparecido (Balance is gone but reason is not identified or found)
6: Cambio de Card a Flex/Flex a Card (Product chage has failed)
8: PPC desactivo por error (Mistake in deactivation)
9: SMS faturado y no enviado (SMS has been debited but no delivered)
10: Llamadas internacionales (wrong tariff in international calls)
11: Recarga no aplicada (Refill is done but never allocated)
12: scratch card utilizada (Customer has a gotten a used scratch card)
13: Paqueticos (Granting a Paquetico (Onnet, Offnet, Morning, illimited, Zone1, SMS))
